data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Lohardaga, Jharkhand, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lohardaga, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Lohardaga, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Lohardaga, Jharkhand, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Lohardaga against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Nagarchi (Hindu traditions) people.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Lohardaga, Jharkhand, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Lohardaga, Jharkhand, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Lohardaga, Jharkhand, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

location.name: Lohardaga
location.people_groups_list: Gandharb (Hindu traditions), Nagarchi (Muslim traditions), Sekera, Munnewar, Khadura
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gandharb (Hindu traditions) (15,000), Nagarchi (Muslim traditions) (200), Sekera (300), Munnewar (600), Khadura (15,000)
